amendment.description: Amendment requires Congressional approval for all rules under the authority of the Affordable Care Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 113-187 to require congressional approval for all rules under the authority of the Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 185 (Roll no. 438).
